channel.title: Projects on Joao Correa
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Joao Correa

item.title: Gene Discovery in ALS with Embedding Models
item.description: Prioritizing causal genes in ALS by integrating statistical genetics with word embeddings from biomedical literature.

item.title: 3D Human Face Reconstruction
item.description: A curvature-based approach for reconstructing 3D human faces from sparse point clouds

item.title: SpellNet: Real-Time Multilingual Sign Language Detection
item.description: A system for real-time detection and recognition of sign languages (LIBRAS and ASL), enabling inclusion and accessibility.

item.title: Orquidea
item.description: A ReactJS web application for exploring researcher metrics using ORCID API

item.title: Image Processing Toolkit
item.description: A toolkit for image processing built from scratch in C, without external libraries.
